inspector.referenceMaterial.tooltip: Settings will be copied from the material specified here.
inspector.ignoreMaterials.tooltip: The settings of the material set here will not be copied.
inspector.properties.tooltip: The properties entered here will be copied.
inspector.menuName.tooltip: This is the name of the menu displayed on VRChat.
inspector.parentOverride.tooltip: The menu will be placed in the folder specified here. If nothing is specified, the menu will be placed in the parent MenuFolder component if it exists, or in the root if not.
inspector.icon.tooltip: This is the icon displayed on the VRChat menu.
inspector.isSave.tooltip: If you turn this on, the state will be saved even if the avatar is loaded.
inspector.isLocalOnly.tooltip: If you turn this on, objects will only be turned on and off from your perspective.
inspector.objects.tooltip: The object specified here will be turned on or off when the menu is activated.
inspector.blendShapeModifiers.tooltip: The BlendShape specified here will be set to the specified value when the menu is activated.
inspector.skinnedMeshRenderer.tooltip: The mesh specified here will be controlled. If nothing is specified, all meshes will be controlled.
inspector.name: Name
inspector.materialReplacers.tooltip: Materials of the mesh specified here will be set to the specified material when the menu is enabled.
inspector.materialPropertyModifiers.tool: The material properties specified here will be set to the specified values when the menu is activated.
inspector.renderers.tooltip: The mesh specified here will be controlled.
inspector.defaultFrameValue.tooltip: When you reset your avatar, the frame value will be the value you set here.
inspector.frames.tooltip: Set the properties to be manipulated with Radial Puppet. Frames in between are interpolated.
inspector.frameValue.tooltip: Keyframe value. 0 when Radial Puppet is at its minimum, 1 when it is at its maximum.
inspector.previewWarn: If you want to turn the object attached to this component on or off, please stop the preview.
dialog.error.processfailed: Avatar build was canceled because an error occurred during processing.
dialog.error.parameterover: The number of parameters to synchronize exceeds the upper limit. Please reduce the number of parameters by making parameters local-only or consolidating operations.
dialog.error.menuNameEmpty: The menu name is empty. Please set a name.
dialog.error.menuNameDuplication: Duplicate menu name. Please change the name.
dialog.error.parameterDuplication: Duplicate parameter name. Please change the name.
dialog.error.defaultDuplication: Multiple objects are turned on. Please check only one so that the tool can set the initial value.
dialog.error.allObjectOff: All objects below are turned off. Please check only one so that the tool can set the initial value.初期値を設定できるようにどれか1つだけオンにしてください。
dialog.error.avatarRootNofFound: Avatar root object not found. Make sure that the object is inside the avatar and that the avatar has an AvatarDescriptor attached.
